attributes.action: Allow health care workers and NHS workers to earn more than a footballer does.
attributes.additional_details: Also for the work that all social care and NHS workers do I feel thier work isn't appreciated enough and to somehow recognise what they do more. To clap for our workers on the same date every year. March 26th at 8pm.
attributes.background: To allow all social care workers and nhs staff an increase in there wages which is similar to what a footballer would earn. As this work puts so much risk to themselves and there families than what a Premier league footballer does.

rejection.details:
The Government is not responsible for how much footballers are paid.

We have published a petition calling on the Government to increase pay for NHS healthcare workers and recognise their work, which you might like to sign: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300073

We have published a petition calling on the Government to increase taxes on high earners to fund emergency Budget measures, which you might like to sign: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/305795

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
